name: who-really-website
description: The user-facing website for Who Really?!
author: Jonas Schumacher <jonas.merlin.schumacher@mailbox.org>

scripts.postinstall: mv -f node_modules/spectre.css/dist/spectre.min.css dist/assets/css/spectre.min.css && mv -f node_modules/spectre.css/dist/spectre-exp.min.css dist/assets/css/spectre-exp.min.css && mv -f node_modules/spectre.css/dist/spectre-icons.min.css dist/assets/css/spectre-icons.min.css
